issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing KS Contacts I noticed that the typed  in text field's content disappears after "Done" button pressed.

This is not a regression, occurs on 2.0.2 as well.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run KS - Phone - Contacts - Search by ID.
2. Tap on a text field.
3. Type ID.
4. Press "Done" button on a soft keyboard.

Actual result:
The typed in content disappeared.

Expected result:
The text field's content should not disappear.
fields.summary: Kitchen Sink: Android-Contacts - Clicking "Done" button clears the text field's content
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206141932
Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120615104152
Galaxy Nexus 4.0.4

Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
